description:
To soothe the public opinion, Rossiu overthrows Simon and puts him under arrest. But when the Anti-Spirals launch a large-scale attack on Kamina City, he is left with no option but to let Simon engage the enemy using the Gurren-Lagann, not before resorting to extremes to put him under his control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikinokorunda Donna Shudan o Tsukatte mo
Musimy żyć, bez względu na wszystko
Noi tutti sopravviveremo, con ogni mezzo!
Nous devons survivre, peu importe les moyens à employer
We Must Survive. No Matter What It Takes!
Wir werden überleben, koste es, was es wolle
Мы должны спастись во что бы то ни стало
生き残るんだ どんな手段を使っても
